author: Justin Wise
title: FDA issues emergency-use authorization for anti-malaria drugs amid coronavirus outbreak
description: The Food and Drug Administration on Sunday (FDA) issued an emergency-use authorization for a pair of anti-malaria drugs as health officials work to combat the rapid spread of the novel coronavirus.The Health and Hu...
content:
The Food and Drug Administration on Sunday (FDA) issued an emergency-use authorization for a pair of anti-malaria drugs as health officials work to combat the rapid spread of the novel coronavirus. 
The Health and Human Services Department (HHS) said in a st… [+2641 chars]
